imageAlt: Image of a skateboard deck with a snake painted on it
title: Skateboard Art
body: In March 2022 I was asked to participate in a skateboard art competition for 3SIXTY's 10 year anniversary. All skateboard decks were auctioned off at the end of the competition, where all profits made were donated to Skateistan.

imageAlt: Image of a painting with two greyhounds wearing sweaters
title: Secondhand Art
body: In January 2022 I bought a secondhand painting of two greyhounds and painted sweaters on them as a birthday gift for a dog and sweater (especially dogs in sweaters) obsessed friend.

imageAlt: Image of Ida Watson tattooing with a coil tattoo machine
title: Skin Art
body: In May 2020 I tried tattooing for the first time with the guidance of a tattooist friend. This is where my journey into the world of tattooing started.
